cause.description:
In remote areas of India, there are no schools. Hence, the children there cannot receive there education. We need your help in order for these children to get their education.
"If a poor boy cannot come to education, education must go to him" - Swami Vivekananda
Ekal Vidyalaya movement strives to create a network of non-formal schools that will educate and empower children in rural and tribal India.
The only thing that Ekal Vidyalaya foundation requests from you is to sponsor a school for $365 (A dollar a day school).
